column4: HOW DO I RESET UBUNTU BACK TO SAFE SETTINGS???? ITS CRASHING LIKE MAD!
GIMME ME A A COMMAND TO RETSET MY COMPOUYTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

or when nothing is working anymore <Alt>+<Print>+S (syncing... wait) <Alt>+<Print>+U (mounting filesystem read-only... wait!) then <Alt>+<Print>+B (reboot immediately). Before you should try in a non-graphical terminal (when system doesn react anymore) <Strg>+<Alt>+<Entf> This is more the smooth way
when is it crahsing. btw, stop writing in uppercase letters, if possible ;-)
